data.comment: The match has started, with Zulte kicking-off.
Gent's Michael Ngadeu has been booked in Ghent.
In the minute 27, Goal! Omar Govea gives Zulte a 0-1 lead in Ghent.
Goal! Zulte extend their lead to 0-2 thanks to a Tomas Chory header.
The first-half is over at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 46, Gent kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Elisha Owusu is on a sub for Roman Bezus for Gent.
Laurens De Bock (Zulte) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Gent make their second substitution with Anderson Niangbo replacing Sven Kums.
Jelle Vossen is replacing Tomas Chory for Zulte at Ghelamco Arena.
The home team have replaced Alessio Castro-Montes with Jordan Botaka. This is the third substitution made today by Wim De Decker.
In the minute 82, Zulte move into a more comfortable 0-3 lead. Jelle Vossen is the scorer with a header!
Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a second substitution, with Panagiotis Armenakas replacing Omar Govea.
The match is over. Final score 0-3.
The away team replace Bassem Srarfi with Mathieu De Smet.
